required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of JS001+ Pemetrexed Plus Carboplatin in Patients With EGFR-mutation Positive and T790M Negative After Progression on EGFR-TKI Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: JS001 Combined With Pemetrexed Plus Carboplatin for Treatment of Recurrent or Advanced Non-small-cell Lung Cancer With EGFR-mutation Positive and T790M Negative After Progression on EGFR-TKI Treatment：a Multi-center, Single Arm Phase II Study

brief_summary.textblock: JS001 combined with pemetrexed plus carboplatin for treatment of recurrent or advanced non-small-cell lung cancer with EGFR-mutation positive and T790M negative after progression on EGFR-TKI treatment：a multi-center, single arm phase II study

primary_outcome.description: The primary endpoint is the antitumor activities in this study

intervention.description: anti-PD-1 monoclonal antibody injection (JS001)360mg combined with Pemetrexed and carboplatin
